verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764> upon Shoshannim <WH7799>, for the sons <WH1121> of Korach <WH7141>, Maschil <WH4905> <WH8688>, A Song <WH7892> of loves <WH3039>. My heart <WH3820> is inditing <WH7370> <WH8804> a good <WH2896> matter <WH1697>: I speak <WH559> <WH8802> of the things which I have made <WH4639> touching the king <WH4428>: my tongue <WH3956> is the pen <WH5842> of a ready <WH4106> writer <WH5608> <WH8802>.

Thou art fairer <WH3302> <WH8795> than the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>: grace <WH2580> is poured <WH3332> <WH8717> into thy lips <WH8193>: therefore 'Elohim <WH430> hath blessed <WH1288> <WH8765> thee for ever <WH5769>.
Gird <WH2296> <WH8798> thy sword <WH2719> upon thy thigh <WH3409>, O most mighty <WH1368>, with thy glory <WH1935> and thy majesty <WH1926>.

And in thy majesty <WH1926> ride <WH7392> <WH8798> prosperously <WH6743> <WH8798> because <WH1697> of truth <WH571> and meekness <WH6037> and righteousness <WH6664>; and thy right hand <WH3225> shall teach <WH3384> <WH8686> thee terrible things <WH3372> <WH8737>.
Thine arrows <WH2671> are sharp <WH8150> <WH8802> in the heart <WH3820> of the king's <WH4428> enemies <WH341> <WH8802>; whereby the people <WH5971> fall <WH5307> <WH8799> under thee.
Thy throne <WH3678>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, is for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5703>: the sceptre <WH7626> of thy kingdom <WH4438> is a right <WH4334> sceptre <WH7626>.

Thou lovest <WH157> <WH8804> righteousness <WH6664>, and hatest <WH8130> <WH8799> wickedness <WH7562>: therefore 'Elohim <WH430>, thy 'Elohim <WH430>, hath anointed <WH4886> <WH8804> thee with the oil <WH8081> of gladness <WH8342> above thy fellows <WH2270>.
All thy garments <WH899> smell of myrrh <WH4753>, and aloes <WH174>, and cassia <WH7102>, out of the ivory <WH8127> palaces <WH1964>, whereby <WH4482> they have made thee glad <WH8055> <WH8765>.
Kings <WH4428> ' daughters <WH1323> were among thy honourable women <WH3368>: upon thy right hand <WH3225> did stand <WH5324> <WH8738> the queen <WH7694> in gold <WH3800> of Ofir <WH211>.

Hearken <WH8085> <WH8798>, O daughter <WH1323>, and consider <WH7200> <WH8798>, and incline <WH5186> <WH8685> thine ear <WH241>; forget <WH7911> <WH8798> also thine own people <WH5971>, and thy father's <WH1> house <WH1004>;
So shall the king <WH4428> greatly desire <WH183> <WH8691> thy beauty <WH3308>: for he is thy YY <WH113>; and worship <WH7812> <WH8690> thou him.
And the daughter <WH1323> of TZor <WH6865> shall be there with a gift <WH4503>; even the rich <WH6223> among the people <WH5971> shall intreat <WH2470> <WH8762> thy favour <WH6440>.
The king's <WH4428> daughter <WH1323> is all glorious <WH3520> within <WH6441>: her clothing <WH3830> is of wrought <WH4865> gold <WH2091>.

She shall be brought <WH2986> <WH8714> unto the king <WH4428> in raiment of needlework <WH7553>: the virgins <WH1330> her companions <WH7464> that follow <WH310> her shall be brought <WH935> <WH8716> unto thee.
With gladness <WH8057> and rejoicing <WH1524> shall they be brought <WH2986> <WH8714>: they shall enter <WH935> <WH8799> into the king's <WH4428> palace <WH1964>.
Instead of thy fathers <WH1> shall be thy children <WH1121>, whom thou mayest make <WH7896> <WH8799> princes <WH8269> in all the earth <WH776>.

I will make thy name <WH8034> to be remembered <WH2142> <WH8686> in all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>: therefore shall the people <WH5971> praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5703>.
